services.translation[0].definitions[0].d: skilled work or advice from a particular type of worker who you use to help you do something
services.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Lydia obtained the services of a qualified nurse.
Why don’t you offer your services as a tennis coach?

services.translation[1].definitions[0].e: How far is it to the next services?
